818: The AI based wind removal feature detects the wind noise in the clip and automatically removes it. A new audio clip will be created to replace the original on the timeline.
AI 风噪消除功能将检测片段中的风噪声并自动将其删除。新的音频片段会随即产生并替换时间线上的原始片段。
819: The AI based speech enhancement feature detects the background noise and automatically removes it to enhance the speech. A new audio clip will be created to replace the original on the timeline.
AI 语音增强功能将检测片段中的背景噪音并自动将其删除以增强语音。新的音频片段会随即产生并替换时间线上的原始片段。
823: The AI based restoration assistant detects the general noise and automatically removes it. A new audio clip will be created to replace the original on the timeline.
基于 AI 的音频恢复助理手可检测一般噪音并自动将其移除。新的音频片段会随即产生并替换时间线上的原始片段。

834: Use the Click Removal setting if your audio clips contain unwanted clicking or related sounds in them.
如果您的音频片段中包含不需要的咔嗒声或相关声音，请使用“杂音消除”设置。
835: Use Clipping Removal setting if parts of your audio's waveform is clipped off at the top or bottom, causing distortions or loss in audio quality.
如果部分音频波形在顶部或底部被削掉，导致失真或音频质量下降，请使用“限幅噪声删除”设置。
836: The Hum Removal setting removes hum noise and its harmonics from audio clips. Hum noise is usually caused by electronics (faulty microphone, electrical interference with recording device, etc.) during the original recording.
“嗡嗡声消除”设置可消除音频片段中的嗡嗡声及其谐波。嗡嗡声通常是由原始录音过程中的电子设备（麦克风故障、录音设备受到电气干扰等）引起的。
837: This setting helps you remove plosives, which are blasts of air or thumps/pops in the audio that can occur when speaking/singing the letters b, k, p, t.
此设置可帮助您去除爆破音，爆破音是在说/唱字母 b、k、p、t 时可能在音频中发出的空气爆炸声或砰砰声/啪啪声。
838: Reduce or eliminate the excessive prominence of sibilant consonants, such as the sounds normally represented in English by 's', 'z', 'ch', 'j' and 'sh', in recordings of the human voice.
减少或消除齿音辅音的过度突出，例如英语在人声录音中通常用 's'、'z'、'ch'、'j' 以及 'sh' 表示的声音。
839: Use Speech Enhancement to improve the dialogue in your audio clips by isolating it and removing any non-stationary background audio/noise.
使用“语音增强”通过隔离和移除任何非固定背景音频/噪音来改善音频片段中的对话。
840: Your platform does not supported this feature. Please check your hardware compatibility.
您的平台不支持此功能。请检查您的硬件兼容性。

843: Adjust the volume or add a fade in/out effect to an audio or video clip with audio.
调整音量或将淡入/淡出效果添加到音频片段或带有音频的视频片段。
844: Quickly edit length of audio clips.

应用 AI 视频画质修复来增强细节、改善光线、消除视频画面噪点，并将分辨率升级到 1080p 或 4K，以获得最佳清晰度。

5628:
To track an object in this video with a title/overlay/media clip:

1. Add the title, overlay, or media clip to the timeline.

2. Select the added title/overlay/media clip.

3. Click the [Edit] button and then switch to the Tracking tab.

若要让文字、叠加对象或媒体片段追踪此视频中的对象，请依下列步骤操作：

1. 将文字、叠加对象或媒体片段加入时间线。

2. 选择所加入的文字、叠加对象或媒体片段。

3. 点击 [编辑] 按钮，然后切换至「追踪」标签页。
5629:
How to track an object:

Step 1:
• Drag to adjust the yellow selection box around the object you want to track.

Step 2:
• Click [Track] to start tracking from the current playhead position. If you make changes to the tracked object's settings, click [Track Again] to update the tracking.

对象追踪操作说明：

步骤 1：
• 拖曳以调整欲追踪对象周围的黄色选取框。

步骤 2：
• 点击 [追踪] 以从当前播放指示器位置开始追踪。若您更改了追踪对象的设置，请点击 [重新追踪] 以更新追踪结果。

6773:
CyberLink PowerDirector could not set the recording profile. This may be due to:
1. Your computer’s operating system not recognizing the capture device.
2. The capture format not being compliant with the industry standard format.
3. There being no time/date stamp information on the tape or the information containing errors.

Try to:
1. Ensure your capture device’s driver is up to date and can be correctly detected in the Control Panel.
2. Reset the capture settings to default within the capture device application you are using.
3. Choose "Do not detect scenes after capture" in the Capture Preferences.

讯连科技威力导演无法设置录制配置文件。可能的原因有：
1. 您的计算机操作系统无法识别捕捉设备。
2. 捕捉格式不符合产业标准格式。
3. 磁带上无时间/日期戳信息或信息中含有错误。

尝试：
1. 确保捕捉设备的驱动程序是最新的且能够正确地被控制面板检测到。
2. 在使用的捕捉设备程序中将捕捉设置重置为默认。
3. 在“捕捉首选项”中选择“完成捕捉后不检测场景”。

7912:
CyberLink PowerDirector could not complete the batch capture. This may be due to:
1. Your computer’s operating system not recognizing the capture device.
2. The capture format not being compliant with the industry standard format.
3. There being no time/date stamp information on the tape or the information containing errors.

Try to:
1. Ensure your capture device’s driver is up to date and can be correctly detected in the Control Panel.
2. Reset the capture settings to default within the capture device application you are using.
3. Choose "Do not detect scenes after capture" in the Capture Preferences.

8138: 我的个人资料 & 创作
8144:
Interlaced video

Video clips in NTSC or PAL format are interlaced. In interlaced video, each frame includes two fields that are displayed in two passes. Before exporting video, make sure the field order you specify matches that of the receiving system. Otherwise, motion may appear stuttered, or the edges may appear broken. If either of these problems occur, switch the field order and produce your video again. Usually, only video that will be displayed on a television should be produced as interlaced video.

Progressive video

Most PCs display video in progressive format. In progressive format, each line in a frame is displayed in one pass from top to bottom before the next frame appears. If your video is destined to be displayed only on a computer, produce your video in progressive format.

隔行扫描视频

NTSC 或 PAL 格式的视频片段均是隔行扫描。在隔行扫描视频中，每一帧包括两个帧场，显示在两个通道中。导出视频前，请确认您指定的场顺序与接收系统的顺序相匹配。否则，可能会出现黑白线干扰，或者边缘会出现断裂现象。如发生其中任何一种情况，请更改场顺序并重新制作影片。通常，只有要在电视上播放的视频才应该制作成隔行扫描视频。

逐行扫描视频

大多数电脑播放逐行扫描格式的视频。在逐行扫描格式中，一帧中的每一行从上到下显示出来，然后继续显示下一帧。如果影片被指定仅在电脑上播放，则应以逐行扫描格式制作。

8152: Aspect ratio refers to the ratio of width to height of a traditional television. Traditional television sets have a 4:3 aspect ratio. New HD widescreen television sets have a 16:9 aspect ratio. Traditional television sets are almost square in appearance; widescreen displays are more rectangular. If you are using a clip that does not match the aspect ratio of your current project, CyberLink PowerDirector can adjust the aspect ratio for you. CyberLink PowerDirector can either use letterbox to convert your clip to match the current aspect ratio, or it can modify the clip itself and stretch/shrink it to match the current aspect ratio.

显示比例是指传统电视机屏幕宽度和高度的比例。传统电视机的显示比例为 4:3。新的高清宽屏电视机显示比例为 16:9。传统电视机屏幕画面几乎是正方形；宽屏幕显示画面更接近长方形。如果您使用的片段与您当前项目的显示比例不匹配，讯连科技威力导演可以调节显示比例。讯连科技威力导演既可以使用 Letterbox 转换片段，使其与当前显示比例相匹配，也可以修改片段本身，对其进行拉伸/收缩，使其与当前显示比例相匹配。

8268: 1. The tape cannot be written to from PC via an IEEE 1394 ("FireWire") connection. Using the "Write to DV Tape" feature will result in missing date time information.\n2. The tape cannot be written to from VCR via the S-Video or Audio/Video connector. \n3. Recording times must be sequential. Do not scan a tape on which subsequent timecodes appear before preceding timecodes.
1. 磁带无法通过 IEEE 1394 ("火线") 连接从计算机写入。使用 "写入 DV 磁带" 功能将导致日期时间信息丢失。\n2.无法通过 S 视频或音频/视频接口从 VCR 写入至磁带。\n3. 录制时间必须连续。如果后面的时间码显示在前面的时间码之前，则不要扫描磁带。
8269: 1. QuickScan should ideally start scanning from the beginning of a tape. If your tape contains recorded content, rewind it to the beginning.\n2. Avoid frequent ejecting and reloading of the tape, as this causes timecode discontinuity and may generate errors during scanning.\n3. Avoid leaving blank segments in the middle of a tape. Use the [End Search] button (on most camcorders) to locate the end of the recorded section before shooting new video content.
1. 理论上，“快速扫描”应从磁带开头开始扫描。如果磁带包含录制的内容，请倒带至开始处。\n2. 避免经常退带和重装磁带，这样做会导致时间码不连续，而且可能在扫描过程中产生错误。\n3. 避免在磁带中留下空白区段。使用 [结尾搜索] 按钮（多数摄像机上均有）在拍摄新视频内容前定位到录制的结尾部分。

There is not enough system memory to smoothly run the program. Try:
1. Saving your project, closing the program, and then reopening it.
2. Removing some effects from the project, or using fewer timeline tracks.
3. Opening the Task Manager and closing any unneeded programs.
4. Install more system memory into your computer.

流畅运行程序所需的系统内存不足。尝试：
1. 保存项目，关闭程序，然后重新打开。
2. 删除项目中的部分效果，或使用较少的时间线轨。

8795:
Possible causes:
1. The total size of the source data is larger than the free space of the inserted disc or HDD.
2. When creating VCD/SVCD discs, the total size of files (ITEMxxxx.*) in the Segment Play  Item Area exceeds the limited size 297000 Sectors.
3. The size of the input buffer is not enough to contain the retrieved data for output.

可能的原因：
1. 源数据的总大小超过了插入光盘或 HDD 的可用空间。
2. 创建 VCD/SVCD 光盘时，“片段播放项目区域”文件 (ITEMxxxx.*) 总大小超过了 297000 区段的大小限制。
3. 输入缓存大小不足以包含检索到的输出数据。

8961: - To add a Magic Style to the timeline, do this:\n\n
- 要将 Magic Style 添加到时间线，操作如下：\n\n
8962:
1. Select one or more video clips using [Ctrl] + mouse left click. If you select more than one video, make sure they are sequential.

2. Click the Magic Tools button above the timeline and then select Magic Style.

3. Select a style from the Style Library.

4. Click [Preview] to see the result in the Preview Window. You can choose another style to compare different styles.

5. Click [Apply] to confirm the preview result and update the style settings to the timeline.

1. 使用 [Ctrl] + 单击鼠标左键选择一个或多个视频片段。如果您选择了多个视频，请确保它们是连续的。

2. 单击时间线上方的“魔术工具”按钮，然后选择 Magic Style。

3. 从“样式媒体库”中选择一种样式。

4. 单击 [预览] 在“预览窗口”中查看结果。您可以选择其它样式进行比较。

●  Save and quit editing mode: Esc

●  分割字幕 (将光标放在字幕中间)：Ctrl + Enter

●  向上合并 (将光标放在字幕的开头）：Ctrl + Backspace

●  保存并退出编辑器模式：Esc

文字转语音需要强大的云计算才能获得最佳结果，这也会带来额外的成本，因此 AI 功能需要扣除点数。
10234: 1 credit will be deducted for every 200 characters
10235: If the total number of characters in the selected titles/subtitles is less than 200 characters, it will be calculated as 200 characters.
如果所选标题/字幕的字符总数少于 200 个字符，则按 200 个字符计算。
10236: All characters (including spaces) in the titles/subtitles are included to calculated the total amount.
计算总数时将包含标题/字幕中的所有字符（包括空格）。
10237: Example: If you select three titles and the total number of characters is 210, then 2 credits will be deducted.
示例：如果选择三个标题且总字符数为 210，则将扣除 2 点。
